casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Darrell Wayne MANESS. No. 402A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 9, 2008. M. Gordon Widenhouse, Jr., Chapel Hill, Katherine Jane Allen, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Maness. Rex Gore, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th day of July 2008 by State of NC to Amend Record on Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 9th day of October 2008."
